whatIsImagePrompt.title: What is an Image Prompt?
whatIsImagePrompt.subtitle: A comprehensive guide to understanding and creating effective image prompts for AI image generation

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: An image prompt is a text description used to guide AI image generation models in creating visual content. It serves as instructions that tell the AI what kind of image you want to create, including details about the subject, style, composition, lighting, colors, and mood.

understanding.title: Understanding Image Prompts
understanding.paragraph1: Image prompts are the bridge between human creativity and AI capabilities. When you provide a prompt to an AI image generator like Midjourney, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, or Flux, the model interprets your text and generates corresponding visual content.
understanding.paragraph2: The quality and specificity of your prompt directly impact the quality of the generated image. A well-crafted prompt can produce stunning, precise results, while a vague or poorly structured prompt may lead to unexpected or unsatisfactory outcomes.

components.title: Key Components of an Image Prompt

subject.title: 1. Subject Description
subject.description: The main focus of your image. Be specific about what you want to see: "a golden retriever puppy" is more effective than just "a dog."

style.title: 2. Style and Aesthetic
style.description: Describe the artistic style: photorealistic, oil painting, digital art, anime style, watercolor, minimalist, vintage, cyberpunk, etc.

composition.title: 3. Composition and Framing
composition.description: Specify the perspective and framing: close-up, wide angle, aerial view, portrait orientation, rule of thirds, centered composition, etc.

lighting.title: 4. Lighting and Atmosphere
lighting.description: Define the mood and lighting: golden hour lighting, dramatic shadows, soft natural light, neon glow, misty atmosphere, etc.

colors.title: 5. Colors and Palette
colors.description: Specify color schemes: vibrant colors, pastel tones, monochromatic, warm color palette, cool blues and greens, high contrast, etc.

details.title: 6. Details and Quality
details.description: Add quality modifiers: highly detailed, 4K resolution, ultra-realistic, intricate details, sharp focus, professional photography, etc.

basic.label: Basic Prompt:
basic.prompt: A cat sitting on a windowsill

enhanced.label: Enhanced Prompt:
enhanced.prompt: A fluffy orange tabby cat sitting on a wooden windowsill, looking out at a rainy street, soft natural lighting from the window, cozy atmosphere, photorealistic style, shallow depth of field, 4K quality

advanced.label: Advanced Prompt:
advanced.prompt: A majestic fluffy orange tabby cat with bright green eyes sitting elegantly on a vintage wooden windowsill, gazing contemplatively at rain-soaked cobblestone streets below, golden hour lighting filtering through raindrops on the glass, warm and melancholic atmosphere, bokeh effect in background, shot with 85mm lens, photorealistic, highly detailed fur texture, professional photography, 8K resolution

bestPractices.title: Best Practices for Writing Image Prompts
bestPractices.tip1: Be specific and descriptive: More details generally lead to better results
bestPractices.tip2: Use clear language: Avoid ambiguous terms or contradictory descriptions
bestPractices.tip3: Order matters: Place the most important elements at the beginning of your prompt
bestPractices.tip4: Use style references: Mention artists, art movements, or specific styles when relevant
bestPractices.tip5: Experiment and iterate: Try different variations to achieve your desired result
bestPractices.tip6: Learn from examples: Study successful prompts and understand what makes them effective

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.paragraph1: Understanding image prompts is essential for anyone working with AI image generation tools. A well-crafted prompt is the key to unlocking the full potential of these powerful AI models.
conclusion.paragraph2: Whether you're a digital artist, content creator, marketer, or hobbyist, mastering the art of prompt writing will significantly improve your results and help you bring your creative visions to life.

faq.title: About Nano Banana
faq.subtitle: Google's state-of-the-art image generation and editing model
faq.a1: Nano Banana is the nickname for Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, Google's advanced AI image generation and editing model launched in August 2025. It enables users to generate or edit images directly from text prompts or images, with exceptional capabilities in character consistency and natural language editing.
faq.q2: What are Nano Banana's key features?
faq.a2: Nano Banana excels in character consistency for storytelling, multi-image blending, one-shot editing with natural language commands, and scene integration. It can maintain facial features and seamlessly blend edits with backgrounds, making it ideal for creating consistent AI content and product photography.
faq.q3: How does Nano Banana compare to other models?
faq.a3: Nano Banana stands out for its superior character consistency and scene blending capabilities. Users report it significantly outperforms competing models in preserving facial features and integrating edits naturally with backgrounds, making it the top choice for professional content creation.
faq.q4: What are the best use cases for Nano Banana?
faq.a4: Nano Banana is perfect for creating consistent AI influencers, UGC content, social media campaigns, marketing materials, and product photography. Its ability to maintain character consistency across multiple images makes it invaluable for rich storytelling and brand content.
faq.q5: How do I access Nano Banana?
faq.a5: Nano Banana (Gemini 2.5 Flash Image) is available through the Gemini API, Google AI Studio for developers, and Vertex AI for enterprise users. You can also use it directly at gemini.google.com by uploading photos and using natural language editing commands.

physics.title: Advanced Physics Understanding and Realistic Motion

physics.human_motion_desc: Natural body language, facial expressions, and realistic character animations

audio.title: Native Audio Generation with Synchronized Sound Effects

audio.ambient_noise_desc: Immersive background ambience - wind, rain, city sounds, ocean waves perfectly matched to scenes
audio.dialogue_desc: Natural dialogue and voice generation perfectly lip-synced with character movements

Edit and refine your AI-generated clips with professional-grade tools for complete creative control.

editing.cinematic_control_desc: Precise control over camera angles, lens types, depth of field, and cinematic effects

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Google Veo 3.1
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the most advanced video generation AI

q1.question: What is Google Veo 3.1 and what makes it special?
q1.answer: Google's Veo 3.1 is the latest and most advanced video generation AI model that offers native text-to-video, image-to-video, and audio generation capabilities. It creates professional videos with realistic physics, cinematic control, and synchronized sound effects, setting a new standard for AI video generation.

q2.question: Does Veo 3.1 generate audio along with video?
q2.answer: Yes! One of Veo 3.1's standout features is native audio generation. It automatically creates synchronized sound effects, ambient noise, and even dialogue that perfectly matches the visual content, eliminating the need for separate audio production.

q3.question: How does Veo 3.1 handle physics and human movement?
q3.answer: Veo 3.1 brings state-of-the-art understanding of real-world physics including gravity, momentum, and fluid dynamics. It excels at generating natural human movements with realistic body language, facial expressions, and character animations that capture the complexity of real-world motion.

q4.question: Can I control camera angles and cinematic effects?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Veo 3.1 offers professional-level creative control. You can specify camera angles like 'low-angle tracking shot', lens types such as '18mm wide-angle', or effects like 'shallow depth of field'. The model integrates with Google's Flow for advanced video editing capabilities.

q5.question: What video resolutions and formats does Veo 3.1 support?
q5.answer: Veo 3.1 supports multiple resolutions including 480p, 720p, and 1080p, with various aspect ratios (16:9, 9:16, 1:1) and duration options. The model automatically optimizes output quality based on your selected parameters to deliver the best possible results.

seedance.title: Doubao Seedance
seedance.subtitle: The ultimate model with rock-bottom pricing and peak performance, achieving an excellent balance between video quality, speed, and cost

instruction.title: Deep Instruction Analysis and Execution for More Controllable Video Generation
instruction.description: Deep semantic understanding to extract action intent, character relationships, and scene changes; intelligently infer temporal logic and causal relationships from reference images, automatically completing reasonable shots and plot development. Ensuring the rationality and narrative integrity of video generation, achieving 'what you think is what you get'.

multiShot.title: Seamless Multi-shot Narration for Cinematic Creation Experience
multiShot.description: The model intelligently plans combinations of long shots, close-ups, and other camera angles, with smooth multi-shot transitions and well-paced narrative rhythm. In complex interactive scenes, the model automatically adjusts camera focus to achieve coherence between character actions and perspective transitions, making creative expression more professional.

detail.title: Realistic Detail Expression with Consistent Style and Enhanced Quality
detail.description: Building on the detail richness and material realism of Seedance 1.0 pro, the Seedance 1.0 pro fast model further enhances detail expression in facial features, hair texture, and more, making the visuals more vivid and natural. Additionally, the model faithfully preserves the unique style of reference images with stable quality output.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Seedance
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the Doubao Seedance video generation model

q1.question: What makes Seedance different from other video generation models?
q1.answer: Seedance inherits the core advantages of Seedance 1.0 Pro while offering up to 3x faster generation speed with highly competitive pricing. It achieves an excellent balance between video quality, speed, and cost, making professional video generation accessible to everyone.

q2.question: What video resolutions and durations does Seedance support?
q2.answer: Seedance supports multiple resolutions including 480p, 720p, and 1080p, with flexible duration options from 5 to 12 seconds. The model automatically optimizes output based on your selected aspect ratio (16:9, 9:16, or 1:1) for best results.

q3.question: How does Seedance handle complex prompts and multi-shot narratives?
q3.answer: Seedance features deep semantic understanding to extract action intent, character relationships, and scene changes from your prompts. It intelligently plans combinations of long shots, close-ups, and other camera angles with smooth transitions, creating professional cinematic experiences.

q4.question: Can I use reference images with Seedance?
q4.answer: Yes! Seedance supports both text-to-video and image-to-video generation. When using reference images, the model faithfully preserves the unique style and details of your input while adding natural motion and animation.

q5.question: Why doesn't Seedance support audio generation?
q5.answer: Seedance focuses on delivering exceptional visual quality and generation speed at an affordable price point. While it doesn't generate audio, the model excels in visual storytelling, detail preservation, and motion consistency. You can easily add audio in post-production using your preferred editing tools.

howToUse.title: How to Use AI Video Generator
howToUse.step1: Enter video prompt or upload image

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Do you have any questions? We have got you covered

q1.question: What is AI Video Generator?
q1.answer: AI Video Generator creates dynamic videos from text descriptions or static images using advanced AI models.

q2.question: What's the difference between Text to Video and Image to Video?
q2.answer: Text to Video creates videos purely from text descriptions, while Image to Video uses an uploaded image as the starting frame and animates it based on your prompt.

q3.question: How long does it take?
q3.answer: Video generation typically takes 2-5 minutes depending on duration and complexity. You can monitor progress in real-time.

q4.question: What video lengths are supported?
q4.answer: You can generate videos from 3 to 15 seconds depending on the model. Different models have different capabilities.

textToPrompt.faq_subtitle: Do you have any questions? We have got you covered.
textToPrompt.faq1_a: Text Prompt Generator is a versatile tool designed to enhance your AI image generation process. It empowers you to create detailed, descriptive image prompts from simple ideas, allowing for better control over AI-generated artwork using tools like Midjourney, DALL-E, and Stable Diffusion.
textToPrompt.faq2_a: Magic Enhance uses advanced AI to automatically expand and enrich your simple text into detailed, descriptive prompts. It adds relevant details about style, lighting, composition, and atmosphere based on your input, saving you time while improving prompt quality.
textToPrompt.faq3_q: Can I use these prompts with any AI image generator?
textToPrompt.faq3_a: Yes! The prompts generated by our tool are versatile and work with all major AI art platforms including Midjourney, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, Leonardo AI, and more. The detailed descriptions help achieve consistent, high-quality results across different platforms.
textToPrompt.faq4_q: What languages are supported for translation?
textToPrompt.faq4_a: We support translation between multiple languages including English, Chinese, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, and Italian. This helps users work in their preferred language and ensures global accessibility.

videoToPrompt.what_is_desc: A video prompt is a text description that guides AI in generating videos. It should include subject details, actions, scene description, and optional camera/lighting specifications in a single descriptive sentence.
videoToPrompt.what_makes_good_title: What makes a good video prompt?
videoToPrompt.what_makes_good_desc: A good video prompt includes specific subject details, clear movement descriptions, defined scene elements, and optional camera techniques—all concisely written in a single descriptive sentence.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Empowering Everyone to Create with AI
about.story_content: We founded Pixmind because AI art creation was becoming increasingly powerful yet remained challenging for many to master. We believe everyone deserves the opportunity to express creativity through AI, regardless of technical background or language proficiency.
about.mission_content: To make AI art creation more intuitive and accessible to everyone, breaking down technical barriers and language limitations.
about.values_content: We prioritize simplicity, creativity, and inclusivity. Every feature we develop aims to embody these principles.
about.contact_content: Interested in collaboration? We welcome inquiries in technical integration and content creation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with us through the following channels.
contact.testimonial_content: Share your experience! Your testimonial inspires others and helps us improve.
contact.email_content: Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.social_content: Stay updated with our latest features and announcements.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1_answer: PixMind is an all-in-one AI platform for image and video creation. Generate images, create videos, enhance quality, and more—with a comprehensive suite of tools designed to produce high-quality visuals effortlessly. Whether you're working on personal projects or professional content, PixMind helps you create stunning results—fast, simple, and hassle-free.
faq.q2_answer: Yes, PixMind is designed to be user-friendly, making it suitable for both beginners and professionals. Its intuitive interface and powerful AI tools enable users to create high-quality designs without prior design experience or learning costs.
faq.q3_question: How can I get started with PixMind?
faq.q3_answer: Getting started is easy. Just open PixMind in your browser, choose the tool you need, and enter a prompt or upload an image. It's beginner-friendly and takes only a few seconds.
faq.q4_question: Do I need design or technical skills to use PixMind?
faq.q4_answer: No. PixMind is built for everyone. Its intuitive interface allows anyone, even without design experience, to create professional visuals quickly.

card1.title: Bring Still Images to Life with AI-Powered Animation
card1.description: Transform any photo into captivating motion. Our AI breathes life into static images—anime art, oil paintings, or real photos. Upload your image and watch as AI preserves every detail while adding fluid, natural movement.
card1.feature1_desc: From cartoon to photorealistic, AI adapts seamlessly.

card2.title: Turn Ideas into Videos with AI
card2.description: Generate captivating videos from text prompts or images in seconds. PixMind empowers you to turn ideas into high-quality visuals without editing experience. Control the look and feel of your video by modifying the prompt, animate a still photo into a dynamic clip, or access powerful models like Veo 3.1 and Seedance to create short-form videos, product showcases, or social media content with ease.

card3.title: Effortless AI Image Generation for All
card3.description: Turn your ideas into stunning visuals in seconds with AI. Simply describe what you envision, and watch as PixMind generates images that bring your concept to life. Need precise results? Upload a reference image to maintain style consistency and control the output. Go beyond basic generation—apply artistic filters and effects to transform any photo into sketches, anime art, oil paintings, watercolors, pixel art, and more. Fast, intuitive, and endlessly creative.

effects.title: Transform Text & Images into Videos with These Trending AI Video Effects
effects.description: Pixmind AI provides a variety of innovative AI video effects, including AI Kiss, AI Hug, AI Inflate, and more. Unleash your creativity now with these trending AI video generators!
